Text:
If you already have other version of skidrow, flt installed

You just need this crack only and follow my tutorial below.

Go to C:UsersxxxxAppDataLocalSKIDROW205100Storage

Copy & overwrite all files to

C:UsersxxxxAppDataLocalRELOADEDSteam205100remote


That's all.. Play !

@CamilleBC : I meant the "have other version of skidrow, flt installed" part.

How to open appdata:

1º) Press "Windows + R"

2º) Search for "%appdata%" (including % and without "")

3º) In the address bar, click in "AppData"

4º) Go to LOCAL -> SKIDROW -> 205100 -> STORAGE, and copy all files

5º) Go in APPDATA -> LOCAL -> RELOADED -> STEAM -> 205100 -> REMOTE .... and paste/overwrite all files

6º) Play the game =)
